name: Villa Stone Flower Guest House
text_eng:
Villa Stone Flower Guest House offers air-conditioned accommodation in Split’s historical centre, right next to the UNESCO-protected Diocletian’s Palace. Restaurants, bars, shops and the green market are all just steps away.

Villa Stone Flower is a stone house surrounded by a garden filled with palm trees. Each room is set on its own floor and comes with air conditioning, wooden floors, cable TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a spacious balcony with garden furniture.

Guests staying at Villa Stone Flower have access to a shared kitchen, fully equipped with a stove, oven, kitchenware and fridge. Free WiFi access is available throughout the guest house.

The popular sandy beach of Bačvice is about 1.3 km away. Split Airport is 21 km from the property.
text_hr:
Privatni smještaj Villa Stone Flower nudi klimatizirane smještajne jedinice te se nalazi neposredno pokraj Dioklecijanove palače, koja je pod zaštitom UNESCO-a, u povijesnoj jezgri Splita. Restorani, barovi, trgovine i tržnica udaljeni su samo nekoliko koraka.

Kamena kuća Villa Stone Flower okružena je vrtom s palmama. Svaka soba nalazi se na vlastitom katu te ima klima-uređaj, drvene podove, TV s kabelskim programima i vlastitu kupaonicu. Pojedine jedinice nude prostrani balkon s vrtnom garniturom.

Gosti koji borave u privatnom smještaju Villa Stone Flower mogu koristiti zajedničku kuhinju, potpuno opremljenu štednjakom, pećnicom, posuđem i hladnjakom. U cijelom privatnom smještaju moguće je koristiti besplatni WiFi.

Popularna pješčana plaža Bačvice smještena je oko 1,3 km od objekta. Do Zračne luke Split ima 21 km.

name: Hotel As
text_eng:
Stop by the hotel's restaurant, Hotel Restaurant, for lunch or dinner, or grab snacks at the coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in a common area, and tour/ticket assistance. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
text_hr:
Svratite u restoran Hotel Restaurant. To je restoran u ovaj hotel u kojem se poslužuju ručak i večera, a male obroke nudi i kavana/kafić. Utažite žeđ omiljenim pićem u baru/salonu. Besplatan doručak (švedski stol) poslužuje se svaki dan od 6.00 do 10.00. Iskoristite praktične pogodnosti kao što su besplatan bežični pristup internetu, televizor u zajedničkom prostoru i organizacija turističkog obilaska / kupnje ulaznica. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju besplatne novine u predvorju, usluge kemijskog čišćenja / pranja rublja i 24-satno radno vrijeme recepcije. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatno samostalno parkiranje.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od klimatiziranih soba (ukupno 38), koje nude minibarove. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. U kupaonicama su tuš-kade, a nude i sušila za kosu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

name: Globo Hotel
text_eng:
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily from 6 AM to 10 AM. Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju besplatan pristup žičanom internetu, 24-satni poslovni centar i usluge kemijskog čišćenja / pranja rublja. Na lokaciji se nudi samostalno parkiranje (podložno naknadama).

Privatne kupaonice opremljene su kombinacijama tuša i kade, a nude i besplatne toaletne potrepštine te sušila za kosu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

name: Omladinski Hostel
text_eng:
Enjoy a satisfying meal at DUJAM serving guests of Omladinski Hostel. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee. Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Split? This hostel has facilities measuring 1076 square feet (100 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 30 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

name: Apartments M
text_eng: Apartments M are located in Znjan, right on the beachfront and a 40-minute walk along the sea from Split's centre. They offer free internet access and free parking. Local buses stop 300 metres away and offer easy connection to the centre. There is a public beach right in front of the apartments. The accommodation units feature air conditioning and cable TV, fully equipped kitchens and a private bathroom with a shower. You can explore the impressive UNESCO-protected city of Split with its unique Diocletian's Palace. Close to Apartments M there are various café bars and restaurants along the beach. The nearby beach offers numerous activities and water spots facilities.
text_hr: Apartmani M nalaze se uz plažu na Žnjanu, na 40 minuta hoda duž obale od središta Splita. Na raspolaganju su besplatni pristup internetu i besplatno parkiralište. Objekt je udaljen 300 metara od stajališta lokalnog autobusa koji prometuje do centra. Javna plaža smještena je ispred apartmana. Smještajne jedinice uključuju klima-uređaj, TV s kabelskim programima, potpuno opremljenu kuhinju i vlastitu kupaonicu s tušem. Gosti mogu istražiti prekrasan grad Split i jedinstvenu Dioklecijanovu palaču, koja je pod zaštitom UNESCO-a. U blizini Apartmana M nalaze se razni kafići i restorani uz plažu. Na obližnjoj plaži dostupne su brojne aktivnosti i sadržaji za vodene sportove.

name: Apartments Nena
text_eng: Located in a pleasant, quiet neighbourhood of Split, Apartments Nena is within a 15-minute walk from the UNESCO-protected old town and Diocletian's Palace. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Bars, restaurants and cafés can be found in the vicinity. Redecorated in 2013, Apartments Nena features various rooms and a studio with air conditioning and seating areas. Many of the rooms are surrounded by a lush garden. The Adriatic Sea and the well-known Bačvice Beach are approximately a 15-minute walk away from the hostel. Breakfast, lunch and dinner can be ordered at the nearby Opatija Restaurant. The Main Bus and Train Station, as well as Split Ferry Port with links to nearby islands can be reached within 1 km. Free private parking is possible on site.
text_hr: Apartmani Nena nalaze se u ugodnoj i mirnoj četvrti Splita, a udaljeni su 15 minuta hoda od Staroga grada i Dioklecijanove palače, lokaliteta pod zaštitom UNESCO-a. Objekt nudi smještajne jedinice s besplatnim bežičnim pristupom internetu. U blizini su dostupni barovi, restorani i kafići. Smještajni objekt Nena preuređen je 2013. godine, a obuhvaća razne sobe i studio s klima-uređajem te prostorom za sjedenje. Mnoge su sobe okružene bujnim vrtom. Jadransko more i čuvena plaža Bačvice nalaze se na oko 15 minuta hoda od hostela. Doručak, ručak i večera mogu se naručiti u obližnjem restoranu Opatija. Autobusni i željeznički kolodvor te Trajektna luka Split, iz koje polaze linije do obližnjih otoka, nalaze se na 1 km od objekta. Besplatno privatno parkiralište dostupno je u okviru objekta.

name: Split Apartments Peric
text_eng: Split Apartments provides cosy, homely decorated apartments situated in a quiet street, yet only a 5-minute walk from the centre of Split. Free Wi-Fi, free parking and air conditioning are provided for all apartments. Split offers many different museums and cultural sites, but also great restaurants, where a reservation can be made for you. The reception staff can provide all necessary information about the town and its surroundings, to make the best of your vacation. This part of the Adriatic coast is perfectly suited for water sports enthusiasts. Split Apartments enjoy a perfect location as the bus and train stations are at a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Only 50 metres away there is a fruit and vegetable market with various shops, such as a bakery, a pharmacy and a supermarket. Guests can request airport pick-up service for an additional cost. Marjan Hill, which offers many leisure opportunities, as well as many beaches, is close by the Split Apartments.
text_hr: Apartmani Split nude udobne, jednostavno uređene apartmane smještene u mirnoj ulici udaljenoj tek 5 minuta hoda od središta Splita. U sklopu svih su apartmana dostupni besplatni bežični pristup internetu, besplatno parkiralište i klima-uređaj. U Splitu se nalaze brojni muzeji i kulturne znamenitosti, a osoblje može za goste rezervirati stol u raznim izvrsnim restoranima. Na recepciji gosti mogu dobiti sve potrebne informacije o gradu i okolici. Ovaj dio Jadrana idealan je za ljubitelje vodenih sportova. Autobusni i željeznički kolodvor nalaze se na 10 minuta hoda od apartmana Split. Objekt je udaljen samo 50 metara od tržnice s voćem i povrćem te raznim trgovinama poput pekarnice, ljekarne i supermarketa. Gostima je na zahtjev i uz nadoplatu dostupna usluga prijevoza iz zračne luke do objekta. Brdo Marjan odlikuje se brojnim plažama i mogućnostima za rekreaciju, a nalazi se nedaleko od apartmana Split

name: Boutique Hotel Luxe
text_eng:
Grab a bite to eat at Luxe restaurant, a restaurant which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 11 AM. Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a spa tub, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Split? This hotel has facilities measuring 108 square feet (10 square meters), including a meeting room. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a ferry terminal shuttle.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 30 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

name: Art Hotel
text_eng:
Stop by the hotel's restaurant for lunch. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included. Enjoy recreation amenities such as a health club or take in the view from a terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Split? This hotel has facilities measuring 1076 square feet (100 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
text_hr:

Uključen je besplatan doručak (švedski stol). Uživajte u mogućnostima rekreacije uz rekreacijski klub ili se opustite uz pogled koji nudi terasa. Ovaj hotel nudi i besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) te televizor u zajedničkom prostoru. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, besplatne novine u predvorju i usluge kemijskog čišćenja / pranja rublja. Planirate neko događanje u mjestu Split? Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima prostore površine 1076 kvadr. st. (100 m²), koji se sastoje od prostora za konferencije / sastanke. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatno samostalno parkiranje.

Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatni žičani i bežični pristup internetu. U kupaonicama su tuš-kade, a nude i sušila za kosu. name: Apartments Lucac Manus
text_eng: Situated in several locations across Split’s historical centre, Apartments Lucac Manus offers free Wi-Fi. All rooms and apartments are between 150 and 300 metres from the Diocletian’s Palace. All rooms and apartments have air conditioning, a refrigerator and flat-screen cable TV. Coffee and tea making facilities are provided in every room, and apartments also have a well equipped kitchen and washing machine. A hairdryer is provided in every room and apartment. Lucac Manus Apartments also offers a 24-hour front desk. Free public parking is available in a nearby street.
text_hr: Apartmani Lucac Manus nalaze se na nekoliko lokacija diljem povijesne jezgre Splita. Objekt nudi besplatni WiFi. Sve sobe i apartmani udaljeni su između 150 i 300 metara od Dioklecijanove palače. Sve sobe i apartmani uključuju klima-uređaj, hladnjak, TV ravnog ekrana s kabelskim programima te pribor za pripremu čaja/kave. Apartmani sadrže dobro opremljenu kuhinju i perilicu rublja. U svim smještajnim jedinicama dostupno je sušilo za kosu. Recepcija apartmana Lucac Manus otvorena je 24 sata. U obližnjoj ulici gostima je na raspolaganju besplatno javno parkiralište.
